name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick History Cleaner - Chrome Browsing History Cleaner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily clean your Chrome history with Quick History Cleaner. One-click is all it takes to clean your entire browsing history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick History Cleaner is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to streamline your browsing experience. With just ONE click, it automatically clears your Chrome browsing history. Unlike some other extensions, Quick History Cleaner focuses solely on history, leaving cookies, cache, and passwords untouched to keep your user session active.
